text:
@seanhannity President Trump spoke strongly about protecting Americans against Coronavirus in his State of the Union address in February.

Speaker Pelosi TORE UP that Speech.

At this time Democrats were focused on Impeachment.

They didn’t take the Virus seriously.
https://t.co/xkdRJLmIiK
